00017 /****************************************************************************/
00018 
00019 // TBoolValue class
00020 
00021 // Represents a bool value class
00022 
00023 /****************************************************************************/
00024 
00025 class LIBVB4_EXPORT TBoolValue : public TBaseListValue
00026 {
00027 public:
00028     // Constructor.
00029     // "parent"         is the TValueBrowser parent (can not be 0).
00030     // "name"           is the name of the item (text shown for user).
00031     // "page"           is the number of the page the item should be moved (-1 by default, which means the current page).
00032     // "id"             is the unique identifier of the item (-1 by default, which means no id).
00033     // "tt"             is the type QCheckListItem::Type of the item (QCheckListItem::Controller by default).
00034     TBoolValue (TValueBrowser *parent, const QString& name, int page = -1, int id = -1);
00035     // Constructor.
00036     // "parent"         is the TValueBrowser parent (can not be 0).
00037     // "name"           is the name of the item (text shown for user).
00038     // "id"             is the unique identifier of the item (-1 by default, which means no id).
00039     // "tt"             is the type QCheckListItem::Type of the item (QCheckListItem::Controller by default).
00040     TBoolValue (TBaseItem *parent, const QString& name, int id = -1);
00041     // Destructor.
00042     virtual ~TBoolValue() {};
00043 
00044     // Assigns a value "value" to the item.
00045     virtual bool    setValue(const QVariant &value);
00046     // Assigns a special value "svalue" to the item.
00047     virtual void    setSpecial(uint svalue);
00048 
00049     // Assigns a bool value to the item.
00050     bool            setValue(bool val);
00051 
00052     // Returns bool value of the item.
00053     virtual bool    boolean() const     { return m_set.value.toBool(); }
00054 
00055     // Writes item's "value" to bool.
00056     virtual void    writeValue(bool &value)     
00057     { value = m_set.value.toBool(); }
00058 
00059     // Returns item's type name.
00060     virtual char*   ItemID() { return "TBoolValue"; };
00061 
00062     virtual bool    autoIcon() const { return true; }
00063     virtual bool    autoIconActive() const { return true; }
00064 
00065 protected:
00066     // Called internally to update editor geometry.
00067     //virtual void  updateEditorGeometry ( QWidget * editor, const QStyleOptionViewItem & option, const QModelIndex & index ) const;
00068 
00069     virtual int iconSpace() const 
00070     {
00071         return qApp->style()->pixelMetric(QStyle::PM_IndicatorWidth) + 6
00072             /*qApp->style()->pixelMetric(QStyle::PM_CheckBoxLabelSpacing)*/;
00073     }
00074 
00075     // Called internally when the item is clicked by mouse.
00076     virtual void    onClickItem(int col);
00077 
00078     static BoolValueList s_BoolList;
00079 };
00080
